name: search_countries_by_continent
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geography.
Tool description: Powerful APIs for getting information about Countries and Cities
API description: Search for countries by their continent using the specified query parameters.

continent.description: The continent of the countries to search for. This search is case insensitive and requires an exact match.

offset.description: The page number from which the search should continue. Its zero indexed, hence, starts with 0

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to filter the response. Defaults to None.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return per page. Defaults to 10.
